title: Radiohead: Lotus Flower – VIDEO
body:
**A video for the Song ‘Lotus Flower’ has appeared on Radiohead’s [twitter feed](http://twitter.com/#!/radiohead) in preparation for tommorows online release of their eigth studio album, The King Of Limbs.**

The physical release of the CD is slated for the 28th of March but die-hard fans have to wait until the 9th of May for a special ‘newspaper album. “Described by the band as ‘two clear 10-inch vinyl records in a purpose-built record sleeve, many large sheets of artwork, 625 tiny pieces of artwork, a compact disc, and a full-colour piece of oxo-degradable plastic to hold it all together.” Sounds fucking fantastic.

Director **Garth Jennings** usually works under the pseudonym Hammer & Tongs. He was the mastermind behind a number of Eel’s music videos, Blur’s ‘Coffee & TV’ and more recently, the film adaptation of ‘The Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy’

Video Credits:  
Produced and Directed by Garth Jennings  
Choreographed by Wayne McGregor  
Director of Photography- Nick Wood  
Editor- Leila Sarraf

**STOP THE PRESS: We can also confirm that Radiohead have brought the album release forward by 24hours. If you had already pre-ordered The King Of Limbs, head over to [the site](http://www.thekingoflimbs.com/) to download it, or alternatively you can purchase it now.**

**A statement for XL reads as follows:** Radiohead have brought forward the digital release of their new album “The King Of Limbs” by 24 hours with the album now being sent to those who pre-ordered it earlier this week. It is also available for new orders through [http://www.radiohead.com](http://anonym.to/?http://www.radiohead.com/) at a fixed price of £6. A special edition is also available.

With everything ready on their website, the band decided to bring forward the release by a day rather than wait until the planned date of Saturday, Feb 19 to deliver the music.
